title: Amid spread of omicron variant, CDC expected to require negative COVID-19 test 1 day before flying to US
content:
1. Amid spread of omicron variant, CDC expected to require negative COVID-19 test 1 day before flying to US  ABC News

  4. Omicron variant threat could disrupt holiday travel as US weighs new rules  KOMO News

localize.title: omicron変異体の拡大に伴い、CDCは米国への渡航1日前にCOVID-19検査の陰性化を要求する見込み。
在omicron变体的传播中，CDC预计将要求在飞往美国前1天进行COVID-19阴性测试
在omicron變體的傳播中，CDC預計將要求在飛往美國前1天進行COVID-19陰性測試
